Token.Abstract: This protocol is implemented by objects that can be serialized into a representation suitable for transmission over a REST request. Suitable serializations are x-www-form-urlencoded and multipart/form-data.
The value of the Content-Type header for the HTTP Body representation of the serialization.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string value of the Content-Type header for the HTTP body.

Token.Abstract: An NSData representing the HTTP Body serialization of the object implementing the protocol.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSData object respresenting the HTTP body serialization.

Token.Abstract: Returns an input stream for reading the serialization as a stream used to provide support for handling large HTTP payloads.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An input stream for reading the serialization as a stream.

Token.Abstract: Returns the length of the HTTP Content-Length header.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Unsigned integer length of the HTTP Content-Length header.

Token.Abstract: The value of the Content-Type header for the HTTP Body representation of the serialization.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string value of the Content-Type header for the HTTP body.
